about.title: About Belle Rêve
about.subtitle: An innovative beauty brand connecting K-Beauty with global culture

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: Belle Rêve combines K-Beauty's superior technology with each country's cultural identity to provide truly customized beauty experiences to customers worldwide. We don't just sell products - through Co-creation with our customers, we respect and embody the culture and values of each nation.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: We aim to establish ourselves as a leading brand in the global beauty market that respects cultural diversity. Where each country's unique beauty meets K-Beauty innovation, we help people around the world create their own special beauty stories.

japan.description: A premium all-in-one essence born from the fusion of Japanese minimalism and K-beauty technology. A clean beauty product that minimizes skincare steps while delivering maximum results.

features.title: Key Features
features.minimalist: Minimal Skincare: One bottle for toner, essence, and cream effects
features.clean: Clean Beauty: No harmful ingredients, vegan certified
features.quality: K-Beauty Technology: Proven Korean fermentation technology

story.title: Co-creation Story
story.content: This product was created through a 6-month co-creation process with over 500 Japanese community members. Reflecting the voice of Japanese customers who wanted 'perfect skincare even on busy mornings,' we developed a minimal yet effective all-in-one essence.
